titleStmt.title: England and Scotland vnited. With some pious observations thereupon, shewing our brethrens faithfulnesse in this cause. Frustrating the hope of our common adversary, to the downfall of heresies, errours, and schismes. / By I.H. a lover of truth peace and.
titleStmt.author: I.H.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
